thread.title: Veronica Goodloe
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Veronica Goodloe

author: Veronica Goodloe
title: Veronica Goodloe
text: Quicken Loans made the entire refinance process so incredibly easy. All tasks are performed online in an easy user friendly, organized manner. If I had any questions throughout the refinance I would call. My calls were always returned quicklynwirh an answer. I was treated kindly and respectfully at every step of the way. I HIGHLY recommend Quicken to anyone wanting to buy or refinance. Simply a wonderdul company!
